name: Masters of the Dead - Demo
description:
Masters of the Dead is a 1 versus 1 fighting game using the Unity Fighting Game Engine. Created as a proof of concept  of what a fighting game based in the Horror Legends Universe would play like. You can play as 2 of the Legends from the game Horror Legends. Punkie and Killer Keith. Each with their own unique move sets and stages, Forest, and Punkie's Farmhouse!

You can Play a short Arcade mode where you can fight each character at a time. A Verses mode where you can either fight a computer, another local player, or watch two computers fight each other. You can also practice in a Training mode. 

The game supports key-binding and Xbox 360 controllers.

We have no plans on updating this game at this time. For more information about our games please join our discord at octobergames.com
